## Problem Statement

A clear description of the problem you're trying to solve. What workflow is difficult or impossible today?

## Proposed Solution

Describe the solution you'd like to see implemented.

## Alternatives Considered

What other approaches have you considered? Why is your proposed solution better?

## Use Cases

Who would benefit from this feature and how would they use it?

1. As a [type of user], I want to [do something], so that [benefit]
2. ...

## Design Considerations

- Any UI/UX mockups or wireframes?
- Any technical constraints to be aware of?
- Does this need to work offline?
- Any performance considerations?

## Priority

How important is this feature to you?

- [ ] Critical - Blocking my use of DealForge
- [ ] High - Would significantly improve my workflow
- [ ] Medium - Nice to have
- [ ] Low - Minor improvement

## Additional Context

Any other information, screenshots, or examples that would help.
